biocontainers.name: treeview
biocontainers.summary: Simple program for displaying phylogenies on apple macintosh and windows pcs. it provides a simple way to view the contents of a nexus, phylip, hennig86, clustal, or other format tree file. while paup and macclade have excellent tree printing facilities, there may be times you just want to view the trees without having to load the data set they were generated from.

biotools.summary: Simple program for displaying phylogenies on Apple Macintosh and Windows PCs. It provides a simple way to view the contents of a NEXUS, PHYLIP, Hennig86, Clustal, or other format tree file. While PAUP and MacClade have excellent tree printing facilities, there may be times you just want to view the trees without having to load the data set they were generated from.

bioschemas.name: TreeView
bioschemas.summary: Simple program for displaying phylogenies on Apple Macintosh and Windows PCs. It provides a simple way to view the contents of a NEXUS, PHYLIP, Hennig86, Clustal, or other format tree file. While PAUP and MacClade have excellent tree printing facilities, there may be times you just want to view the trees without having to load the data set they were generated from.
